short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a Chrome extension for the participants of STEP 2020 development course.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a Chrome extension for the participants of STEP 2020 development course to make the online class communications easier. For example, participants can send stamps to everyone in the Meet.
